entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
